workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.18269136210481818 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4598771111860436 --weight-decay 0.0007931140535422184 --lr 0.0006440959690422242 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 141132 --max-lr 0.0009064843369416161 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.6620403135092648 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.037663587237785956 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
